text: King Lear () is a 1971 Soviet drama movie directed by Grigori Kozintsev.«Цензура свое дело сделала»КОРОЛЬ ЛИР (1970) It stars Jüri Järvet, Elza Radziņa, and Galina Volchek. The movie is based on William Shakespeare's play King Lear. ==Actors== * Jüri Järvet as King Lear (voiced by Zinovy Gerdt) * Elza Radziņa as Goneril (voiced by Nina Nikitina) * Galina Volchek as Regan * Valentina Shendrikova as Cordelia * Oleg Dahl as Fool == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1971 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Grigori Kozintsev
title: King Lear (1971 USSR movie)
